Package frc.robot.subsystems.drive

Class DrivetrainPoseEstimator

java.lang.Object
frc.robot.subsystems.drive.DrivetrainPoseEstimator
public class DrivetrainPoseEstimator
extends java.lang.Object
Performs estimation of the drivetrain's current position on the field, using a vision system, drivetrain encoders, and a gyroscope. These sensor readings are fused together using a Kalman filter. This in turn creates a best-guess at a Pose2d of where our drivetrain is currently at.
